items.sentence: What do you want Santa to bring you for Christmas?
What gift would you like to receive for Christmas?
The police found Tom\'s body on the kitchen floor.
Tom confessed that he\'d eaten all of the cookies.
Tom could have come to my concert, but he didn\'t.
Tom didn\'t have anything to do with the incident.
Tom didn\'t have much time to finish his homework.
Tom didn\'t have the courage to admit his mistake.
Tom didn\'t have the heart to tell Mary the truth.
Tom didn\'t have time to go jogging every morning.
